page.title: 07Playground games. (2)
page.content: {Queenio.Queenio} :- One person is on and stands with her back to everyone. She throws the ball over her shoulder. Someone catches it and hides it behind their back. Everyone puts their hands behind their backs. They shout "Queenio, Queenio who's got the ballio. Is she fat or is she thin or is she like a rolling pin." The person on turns round and asks someone to turn around. The person turns around without showing the ball. If the person sees you have not got the ball the player on shouts "Empty dustbin". The player on can run through everyone and shout "Make way for the Queen." She repeats these actions until she knows who has the ball. Then that person is on.
